official_title: Testing of a Brief Tool (PSA TOOL) for Prostate Cancer Screening Discussions in Primary Care Settings
inclusion_criteria:
Provider:

* Provider at selected primary care practices in the Cleveland Clinic Health System
* Willing to utilize a guide to aid in decision making for prostate cancer screening

Patient:

- Patient of participating Cleveland Clinic primary care provider who is scheduled for a routine appointment with the provider
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be MALE
Must have minimum age of 40 Years
Must have maximum age of 69 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Not a patient or provider of the Cleveland Clinic Health System
